## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                     | Type                                       | Default                                                                          |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `layout` | `layout`  | Defines the layout of the form. | `{ minWidth: string; columns: number; }[]` | `[     { minWidth: '0', columns: 1 },     { minWidth: '48em', columns: 2 },   ]` |
